body: @yegor256 please do something about it, see [par.21](http://at.teamed.io/policy.html#21)
@Stuk4 I think we should update all our documentation to avoid that confusion in the future

@prondzyn this task is for you, keep [these principles](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions; Total fixed cost of this task is **30 mins** (see [this](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) for more info)

issue.title: #47 documentation update
issue.body:
This PR is for issue #47.

I updated documentation files to be consistent with current SMTP constructor.

body: @Stuk4, please close the issue - PR is merged.
